metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6499 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> This issue is mitigated by src:perl not having '.' in INC since 5.22.2-4 by default. Making as negligible.

criterions.comment: libmp3-info-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
